**Government Tender Announcement**

**Contract Reference:** CB-898-97232249

**Tender Title:** Microvolume Ultrasensitive Flow Cytometer

**Publication Date:** March 21, 2024
**Closing Date:** April 5, 2024 2:00 PM EDT

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
**Trade Agreements:** Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization - Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), and others

**Description:**

The National Research Council of Canada is seeking to acquire a microvolume ultrasensitive flow cytometer to support research in human health and biotechnology. The instrument must have advanced capabilities for measuring particles in the range of 40 nm to 1 µm, including fluorescence sensitivity to detect particles smaller than 20 nm. Real-time individual particle tracking and measurement of single particles simultaneously are also required.

**Technical Requirements:**

The instrument must comply with the following standards:

* Scatter sensitivity with a dynamic range of 40 nm to 1 µm
* Fluorescence sensitivity to measure particles < 20 nm
* Real-time, individual particle trace event to remove risk of swarm detection
* Minimum sample requirement of 10 µL
* Scatter-triggering of signal detection to ensure no risk of false-positive events
* Single particle simultaneous measurement of size, concentration, and fluorescent intensity for fluorescently labelled samples

**Installation and Support:**

The contractor must provide installation, training, manuals, and maintenance and support services at the client's location. The equipment must be delivered within 14 calendar days of the contract award, and installation must be completed within 2 calendar days from the start date.

**Contract Conditions:**

The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Government Contracts Regulations. The contractor must comply with all applicable Canadian Standard Association (CSA) or Underwriters' Laboratories of Canada (ULC) standards.

**Right to Submit a Statement of Capabilities:**

Suppliers who consider themselves qualified and available to provide the described goods or services may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this notice on or before the closing date.

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Jonathan Soles
* Title: Contracting Authority
* Telephone: 343-548-9258
* Email: Jonathan.Soles@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
